title: Restaurant Bill Calculator
description:
Create an interactive program that calculates the total bill for a restaurant meal including tip.

The program should:
1. Ask for the meal cost
2. Ask for the tip percentage (e.g., 15, 20, 25)
3. Calculate the tip amount
4. Calculate the total (meal + tip)
5. Display all values formatted to 2 decimal places

Example:
Enter meal cost: $45.00
Enter tip percentage: 20

Meal cost: $45.00
Tip (20%): $9.00
Total: $54.00
starterCode:
# Get meal cost and tip percentage from user
meal_cost = float(input("Enter meal cost: $"))
tip_percent = float(input("Enter tip percentage: "))

solution:
# Get meal cost and tip percentage from user
meal_cost = float(input("Enter meal cost: $"))
tip_percent = float(input("Enter tip percentage: "))

# Calculate tip amount
tip_amount = meal_cost * (tip_percent / 100)

# Calculate total
total = meal_cost + tip_amount

# Display results
print(f"\nMeal cost: ${meal_cost:.2f}")
print(f"Tip ({tip_percent:.0f}%): ${tip_amount:.2f}")
print(f"Total: ${total:.2f}")
hints: Use float() to convert input to decimal numbers
Use f-string with :.2f for currency formatting
Use :.0f to display percentage without decimals

testCases.description: Should calculate correctly for $45.00 with 20% tip
Should calculate correctly for $100.00 with 15% tip
